website_summaries.verdict: A simple laptop that can handle basic computing needs at a speed that you'll love.
pros: Good for those with basic computing needs
Model includes a 64 GB SSD to yield a fast performance level for storing and retrieving data
Long battery life for all-day working
cons: Chromebook design may be too basic and simple for some users

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Such a study, beautiful and reliable product thus far. It has an incredibly clear and crisp delay and the interface is very neat. I am happy to say that thus far I've been very satisfied with this product especially after my last laptop from Lenovo. Well done acer. I've become an instant fan.
customer_reviews.author: Machel Richardson

customer_reviews.title: 64GB  extra memory comes in very handy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love that it has 64gb. Now that the Play Store features apps for Chromebook that extra memory comes in very handy. It is somewhat heavier than I expected with it's large 14 inch glass touch screen, but it is very thin. Screen is bright and sharp. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice looking and performing Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking and performing Chromebook. My wife has confused it several times with her macbook pro. Screen is great and my daughter takes it in her backpack to school to do homework so the durability has been better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Acer is awesome. Great clarity easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Acer is awesome. Great clarity easy to use. Only complaint is the CAP Shift must be held down to use with no light or warning that it is on. Other than that small drawback this is a powerful and great chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: debh

customer_reviews.title: Android Ready Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Solid Chromebook that is able to run Android Apps (in beta channel). A bit pricey for a Chromebook of its specs is the only reason it isn't 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RickV

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook for the road warrior.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and performance. Solid, flexible Chromebook for the road warrior.
customer_reviews.author: SojuTX

customer_reviews.title: Pros: it is light-weight It is fast Cons: ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it is light-weight It is fast Cons: I have had it for about 2 and a half months and the battery is dying... =(
customer_reviews.author: susan cheung

customer_reviews.title: I really like easy machines to you use
customer_reviews.text: Its so small...I really like easy machines to you use. The price was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Odeen

customer_reviews.title: Love my Acer Chromebook R13
customer_reviews.text: Love my Acer Chromebook R13. So glad to be rid of all the extra's that come with Widows and Mac. Very fast and L O N G battery life. This is my first Chromebook but will not be my last one and it will be Acer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Extra memory is great for downloading Netflix and getting all the android apps ...
customer_reviews.text: handles all of my basic computing needs! Extra memory is great for downloading Netflix and getting all the android apps you want. Solid enough hinge to flip for tablet use. Great looking and solid metal outside. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: slickhouse50

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy something from acer again. The chrome book came dented and the box was torn. So bad
customer_reviews.author: Damien Utterback

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebook R 13 ARM Cortex-A72 2.0GHz 4GB LPDDR3 64GB Flash Drive 13.3" FHD MT Chrome OS (NX.GL4AA.002;CB5-312T-K0YQ)
product_meta.description: Experience the combined benefits of power, flexibility and mobility with the Acer R 13 Convertible 2-in-1 Chromebook laptop. It has a 2.1GHz quad-core MediaTek processor and 4GB of RAM for multitasking efficiency and enhanced productivity, and it runs efficiently on Chrome OS. This Acer Chromebook laptop has a 13-inch touch screen that flips for use as a tablet.
feature_bullets: Mediatek core pilot MT8173 SoC with Quad-Core arm cortex - A72 / A53 hmp
Graphics: integrated image tech power VR Gx62500

specifications.Graphics Coprocessor: Integrated image Tec power VR Gx62500
